title: Bug Splat every few mins
body:
Randomly occurring I get bug splats and my game crashes. If someone could tell me how to send logs that would be greatly appreciated.
I really need help.

replies.body:
Hey there! I think I may have stumbled upon exactly what you need to fix your bug splats: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes 

That should fix the issue. I'm going to be on for awhile so let me know so I can help!
